DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate postprandial glucose metabolism treatment faster-acting insulin aspart subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Postprandial Glucose Metabolism After Treatment With Faster-acting Insulin Aspart Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1864 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Subjects diagnose ( clinically ) type 1 diabetes mellitus least 365 day prior day screen Body mass index 18.528.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Smoker ( define subject smoking least five cigarette equivalent per day ) able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen
